sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../Css/MobileFilter.css'; import all from '../Images/5110770.png' import Mi from '../Images/Mi.png'; import samsung from '../Images/samsung.png' import vivo from '../Images/Vivo.png'; import oppo from '../Images/Oppo.png'; import realme from '../Images/realme.png'; import apple from '../Images/Apple.png'; import poco from '../Images/poco.png'; import oneplse from '../Images/oneplus.png'; import moto from '../Images/moto.png'; import nokia from '../Images/nokia.png' const MobileFilter = ({ selectedBrand, selectedPrice, onBrandChange, onPriceChange }) => (
onBrandChange('')}>
All Mobiles
onBrandChange('redmi')}>
MI
onBrandChange('Samsung')}>
Samsung
onBrandChange('Vivo')}>
Vivo
onBrandChange('Oppo')}>
Oppo
onBrandChange('Realme')}>
Realme
onBrandChange('Apple')}>
Apple
onBrandChange('Poco')}>
Poco
onBrandChange('OnePlus')}>
OnePlus
onBrandChange('Motorola')}>
Motorola
onBrandChange('Nokia')}>
Nokia
onPriceChange(parseInt(e.target.value, 10))} />
{selectedPrice} /-
); export default MobileFilter;
